Package me.joshmcfarlin.cryptocompareapi

Class Historic

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.joshmcfarlin.cryptocompareapi.Historic
  • public class Historic
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for requesting information about historic cryptocurrency prices

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Historic.AverageType
      Represents Average Type used by the API
      static class  Historic.CalcType
      Represents Calculation Type used by the API
      static class  Historic.History
      Represents historic data provided by the CryptoCompare API

    • Method Detail

      • getMinute

        public static Historic.History getMinute​(java.lang.String fSym,
                                         java.lang.String tSym,
                                         java.lang.Boolean tryConversion,
                                         java.lang.String e,
                                         java.lang.Integer aggregate,
                                         java.lang.Boolean aggregatePredictableTimePeriods,
                                         java.lang.Integer limit,
                                         java.lang.Integer toTs,
                                         java.lang.String extraParams,
                                         java.lang.Boolean sign)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         OutOfCallsException,
                                         InvalidParameterException
        Get market data for a symbol pair by minute up to to the provided limit
        Parameters:
        fSym - The cryptocurrency symbol of interest [Max character length: 10]
        tSym - The currency symbol to convert into [Max character length: 10]
        tryConversion - If set to false, it will try to get only direct trading values
        e - The exchange to obtain data from (our aggregated average - CCCAGG - by default) [Max character length: 30]
        aggregate - Time period to aggregate the data over (for daily it's days, for hourly it's hours and for minute histo it's minutes)
        aggregatePredictableTimePeriods - True by default, only used when the aggregate param is also in use. If false it will aggregate based on the current time.
        limit - The number of data points to return
        toTs - Last unix timestamp to return data for
        extraParams - The name of your application (we recommend you send it) [Max character length: 2000]
        sign - If set to true, the server will sign the requests (by default we don't sign them), this is useful for usage in smart contracts
        Returns:
        History A object containing different API data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when a connection cannot be made
        OutOfCallsException - when no more API calls are available
        InvalidParameterException

        Gets market data for a symbol pair by hour up to to the provided limit
        Parameters:
        fSym - The cryptocurrency symbol of interest [Max character length: 10]
        tSym - The currency symbol to convert into [Max character length: 10]
        tryConversion - If set to false, it will try to get only direct trading values

        aggregate - Time period to aggregate the data over (for daily it's days, for hourly it's hours and for minute histo it's minutes)
        aggregatePredictableTimePeriods - True by default, only used when the aggregate param is also in use. If false it will aggregate based on the current time.
        limit - The number of data points to return
        toTs - Last unix timestamp to return data for
        extraParams - The name of your application (we recommend you send it) [Max character length: 2000]

        Returns:
        History A object containing different API data

        Gets market data for a symbol pair by day up to to the provided limit
        Parameters:
        fSym - The cryptocurrency symbol of interest [Max character length: 10]
        tSym - The currency symbol to convert into [Max character length: 10]
        tryConversion - If set to false, it will try to get only direct trading values
        e - The exchange to obtain data from (our aggregated average - CCCAGG - by default) [Max character length: 30]
        aggregate - Time period to aggregate the data over (for daily it's days, for hourly it's hours and for minute histo it's minutes)
        aggregatePredictableTimePeriods - True by default, only used when the aggregate param is also in use. If false it will aggregate based on the current time.
        limit - The number of data points to return
        toTs - Last unix timestamp to return data for
        extraParams - The name of your application (we recommend you send it) [Max character length: 2000]

      • getPriceAtTime

        public static java.util.Map getPriceAtTime​(java.lang.String fSym,
                                           java.lang.String tSyms,
                                           java.lang.Boolean tryConversion,
                                           java.lang.Integer ts,
                                           java.lang.String e,
                                           java.lang.String extraParams,
                                           Historic.CalcType calculationType,
                                           java.lang.Boolean sign)
                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                           OutOfCallsException,
                                           InvalidParameterException
        Gets the price of a symbol pair at an input Unix time
        Parameters:
        fSym - The cryptocurrency symbol of interest [Max character length: 10]
        tSyms - Comma separated cryptocurrency symbols list to convert into [Max character length: 30]
        tryConversion - If set to false, it will try to get only direct trading values
        ts - The unix timestamp of interest
        e - The exchange to obtain data from (our aggregated average - CCCAGG - by default) [Max character length: 30]
        extraParams - The name of your application (we recommend you send it) [Max character length: 2000]
        calculationType - Type of average to calculate (Close - a Close of the day close price, MidHighLow - the average between the 24 H high and low, VolFVolT - the total volume to / the total volume from)
        sign - If set to true, the server will sign the requests (by default we don't sign them), this is useful for usage in smart contracts
        Returns:
        Map containing information about price at input time
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when a connection cannot be made
        OutOfCallsException - when no more API calls are available
        InvalidParameterException

      • getPriceAtTime

        public static java.util.Map getPriceAtTime​(java.lang.String fSym,

      • getDayAverage

        public static java.lang.Double getDayAverage​(java.lang.String fSym,
                                             java.lang.String tSym,
                                             java.lang.Boolean tryConversion,
                                             java.lang.String e,
                                             Historic.AverageType avgType,
                                             java.lang.Integer UTCHourDiff,
                                             java.lang.Integer toTs,
                                             java.lang.String extraParams,
                                             java.lang.Boolean sign)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             OutOfCallsException,
                                             InvalidParameterException
        Gets the current day price average for a symbol pair
        Parameters:
        fSym - The cryptocurrency symbol of interest [Max character length: 10]
        tSym - The currency symbol to convert into [Max character length: 10]
        tryConversion - If set to false, it will try to get only direct trading values
        e - The exchange to obtain data from (our aggregated average - CCCAGG - by default) [Max character length: 30]
        avgType - Type of average to calculate (HourVWAP - a HourVWAP of hourly price, MidHighLow - the average between the 24 H high and low, VolFVolT - the total volume to / the total volume from)
        UTCHourDiff - By default it does UTC, if you want a different time zone just pass the hour difference. For PST you would pass -8 for example.
        toTs - Last unix timestamp to return data for
        extraParams - The name of your application (we recommend you send it) [Max character length: 2000]
        sign - If set to true, the server will sign the requests (by default we don't sign them), this is useful for usage in smart contracts
        Returns:
        Double A number containing the day average
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when a connection cannot be made
        OutOfCallsException - when no more API calls are available
        InvalidParameterException

      • getDayAverage

        public static java.lang.Double getDayAverage​(java.lang.String fSym,
                                             java.lang.String tSym)
